1586180.name: Revhead - Convertible Pack
1586180.description:
Convertibles Pack has been designed for those, who want to stand out from the crowd and want to have some special cars in their garage.
It is a supporter pack of our development: You get extra content, but you don't need it to play our game.

The pack contains 8 of our cars in a roofless variation with several races specifically made for convertibles:
  • Walea
  • Wanja
  • Buthanbang
  • Panania
  • Magura
  • Camira
  • Kanji
  • Narnoo
  • New races for convertibles

If you like the freedom of a convertible, if you like the open air driving mode and if you want to stand out of the others, this is the perfect pack for you!

Everyone likes convertible, but not everyone owns one! :P
1586180.supported_languages:
英语*, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 匈牙利语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 罗马尼亚语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
